title: Video game industry 's wealthiest entrepreneurs 2016
yAxis: Net worth in billion U.S. dollars
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net worth in billion U.S. dollars for 5 number of Entrepreneur (company)s.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is appeared to be the highest at Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) and lowest at Entrepreneur (company) Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon).
The highest value at Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) is 6.26x times more than the lowest value at Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon).

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Net worth in billion U.S. dollars for 5 number of Entrepreneur (company)s.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) and lowest at Entrepreneur (company) Kim Jung-Ju (Nexon).
Entrepreneur (company) William Ding (NetEase) has the second highest value for Net worth in billion U.S. dollars.
The difference of Net worth in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Entrepreneur (company) is 18.4.
Net worth in billion U.S. dollars at Entrepreneur (company) Ma Huateng (Tencent) is 21.9 , second place is William Ding (NetEase) at 11.5, and thirdly is Shi Yuzhu (Giant Interactive) at 5.4.
Considered together, the average Net worth in billion U.S. dollars in all 5 Entrepreneur (company)s is roughly 9.44.
The Net worth in billion U.S. dollars is 47.2 if we add up values of all Entrepreneur (company)s.
